commitResults.messageTitle: Added Add and List functionality
commitResults.messageBody: store a list of the user inputs and list all inputs

commitResults.messageTitle: Added Mark, Unmark functionality
commitResults.messageBody: added ability to mark and unmark task and option to switch to dio bot

commitResults.messageTitle: Added Todo, Event and Deadline functionality
commitResults.messageBody: added handling of different type of task, modified structure of task accommodate for the different tasks

commitResults.messageTitle: Tested UI Testing and fixed todo
commitResults.messageBody: fixed todo printing wrong output

commitResults.messageTitle: Added error handling.
commitResults.messageBody: implement 'mark' invalid input and out of range exception, added overall empty input exception and invalid suffix exception.

commitResults.messageTitle: Added Delete feature, and further testing
commitResults.messageBody: implement delete feature and update error message to show warning symbol and restructure the printing of task left to be generic for usage in deletion. Testing of the new functions and ensure correct output

commitResults.messageTitle: Organize and Restructure error checking code
commitResults.messageBody: move error checking into individual methods for organization

commitResults.messageTitle: Add Save and Load functionality
commitResults.messageBody: implement storage class which saves and load the tasklist.

commitResults.messageTitle: Update variable names
commitResults.messageBody: change variable name to make more sense

commitResults.messageTitle: Add Date/Time support to tasks
commitResults.messageBody: implement deadline and event to work with localdate and localtime.

commitResults.messageTitle: Restructure classes to become more OOP
commitResults.messageBody:
Duke class: extract out console, command & parser class.

Extracting the different classes allow each class to handle their individual functionality. This allows for easier troubleshooting and re-use of code (inheritance).

Storage, Console, Command, DukeException classes is affected by OOP restructuring. Output of commands is encapsulated in a class 'BotMessage' and Command word and format is encapsulated in their individual subclasses of Command.

Other minor changes: clean up code spacing.

commitResults.messageTitle: Organize classes into packages
commitResults.messageBody: Divide all classes into multiple packages due to the increase number of classes.

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix Parser class formatting issue
commitResults.messageBody:
Parser class methods did not use the constants provided.

Make methods use constants to make it easier for user to change date time format.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add JUnit testing and Fix name merge issues
commitResults.messageBody:
Require testing for classes to ensure proper behaviour of code.

Implement ParserTest,  DukeTest and DeadlineTest to test functionality of Parser, Duke and Deadline classes.

Other info
- Add a static formatMessage method to Console.
- Extract Duke commandFeedback handling into a method.
- Add a method to all commands to get command name.
- Fix naming issues in BotMessage and Add missing @Override tag in Task

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix Storage loading wrong file path and minor issues
commitResults.messageBody:
Storage class was loading the wrong file path, /data/taskInfo instead of <user.dir>/data/taskInfo. This results in Storage initializing creating the file at the wrong location compared to file read/write.

Other info
- Fix Console print issue (print instead of println).
- Fix JUnit testing to match with Console print.

commitResults.messageTitle: Update code to comply with standard and minor bug fix
commitResults.messageBody: Split .* to individual imports and make storage class throw exception when directory and file cannot be created.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add JavaDocs to all classes.
commitResults.messageBody: Add JavaDoc comments to the code.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add Find command
commitResults.messageBody: Add a command to list the task that matches with the user input specified.

commitResults.messageTitle: Update JavaDoc for new Find command
commitResults.messageBody: Update the bot messages to have a javadoc header for the find methods.

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix AJar and Add missing comment for FindCommand
commitResults.messageBody:
Add missing parameter description for the FindCommand class

Add manifest file for AJar artifact build as shadow jar file was unable to run.

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix build.gradle file to allow jar build to work
commitResults.messageBody: build.grade file path to the duke.java class was not correct.
